mapper.select: select * from (SELECT ROWNUM RN, t.* FROM (SELECT restaurants.*, CASE WHEN stores.stars IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE stores.stars / cnt END AS stars, CASE WHEN stores.cnt IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE stores.cnt END AS cnt FROM restaurants LEFT JOIN stores ON restaurants.id = stores.id ORDER BY stars desc)t )WHERE RN BETWEEN #{a} AND #{b}
